newsitem.title: JAPAN: TSE says Nichiei Finance to be delisted on Jan 23.
newsitem.headline: TSE says Nichiei Finance to be delisted on Jan 23.

text.p: The Tokyo Stock Exchange said on Tuesday that Nichiei Finance Co Ltd would delist its shares on January 23, 1997.

Nichiei Finance, which is a credit guarantee and financing company, said on Tuesday that it had applied for liquidation with the Yokohama District Court and that it would work out a restructuring programme under court guidance.
The company's shares will be listed on the stock exchange's liquidation section from October 23 to January 22, 1997.

Nichiei Finance, a unit of lumber firm Nichiei Co Ltd, was hit hard by the bursting of Japan's bubble economy of inflated asset prices in the early 1990s. The company said it formed a restructuring plan in 1994 but its business continued declining.
